title: How to use data from other websites - Quora

response.answer_text: When you scrape a website or websites for the data, you probably have in mind what you intend to do with the data once it is available to you. While some of these uses are ethical many are not considered so. Irrespective of the size of your business be it a start up or an already growing business the below is applicable. There are many benefits of web scraping to businesses, web scraping has played a huge role and will continue to play that huge role in the growth of businesses. This is because without data no business would make any advancement with respect to competitors, data is very crucial in the world of business. Below are some of the ways web scraping could benefit your business and help it grow: Scrape data from two different websites and compare their similarities. Especially useful for eCommerce stores where you can compare pricing and other data points.Create a consistent influx of online reviews as left by your customers across a wide range of review platforms.Analyze your competition by scraping SEO and Social Media data on a daily basis.Generate new leads by acquiring customer information and their contact data using nothing but crawlers.Create large sheets of product details and otherwise from eCommerce platforms like Etsy, Amazon, eBay, and others.Strengthen your marketing strategy by gathering large data sets of user feedback on any given subject.If your target is to grow your business with web scraping then you’re not alone as other businesses have been doing same others are still like you trying to understand in what way web scraping could be of benefit.
